verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H6144>Ar<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste,<s%> and brought to <S%H1820>silence;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H7024>Kir<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste,<s%> and brought to <S%H1820>silence;<s%>

He is gone <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1006>Bajith,<s%> and to <S%H1769>Dibon,<s%> the high <S%H1116>places,<s%> to <S%H1065>weep:<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall <S%H3213>howl<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H5015>Nebo,<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H4311>Medeba:<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H7218>heads<s%> shall be <S%H7144>baldness,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2206>beard<s%> cut <S%H1639>off.<s%>

In their <S%H2351>streets<s%> they shall <S%H2296>gird<s%> themselves with <S%H8242>sackcloth:<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the tops of their <S%H1406>houses,<s%> and in their <S%H7339>streets,<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> shall <S%H3213>howl,<s%> <S%H1065>weeping<s%> <S%H3381>abundantly.<s%>

And <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> shall <S%H2199>cry,<s%> and <S%H500>Elealeh:<s%> their <S%H6963>voice<s%> shall be <S%H8085>heard<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H3096>Jahaz:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the armed <S%H2502>soldiers<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall cry <S%H7321>out;<s%> his <S%H5315>life<s%> shall be <S%H3415>grievous<s%> unto him.

My <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H2199>cry<s%> out for <S%H4124>Moab;<s%> his <S%H1280>fugitives<s%> shall flee <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H6820>Zoar,<s%> a <S%H5697>heifer<s%> of three years <S%H7992>old:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> by the mounting <S%H4608>up<s%> of <S%H3872>Luhith<s%> with <S%H1065>weeping<s%> shall they go it <S%H5927>up;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2773>Horonaim<s%> they shall raise <S%H5782>up<s%> a <S%H2201>cry<s%> of <S%H7667>destruction.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5249>Nimrim<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H4923>desolate:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H2682>hay<s%> is withered <S%H3001>away,<s%> the <S%H1877>grass<s%> <S%H3615>faileth,<s%> there <S%H1961>is<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> green <S%H3418>thing.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H3502>abundance<s%> they have <S%H6213>gotten,<s%> and that which they have laid <S%H6486>up,<s%> shall they carry <S%H5375>away<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of the <S%H6155>willows.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H2201>cry<s%> is gone <S%H5362>round<s%> <S%H853>about<s%> the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab;<s%> the <S%H3213>howling<s%> thereof <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H97>Eglaim,<s%> and the <S%H3213>howling<s%> thereof unto <S%H879>Beer-elim.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H1775>Dimon<s%> shall be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1818>blood:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H7896>bring<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H1775>Dimon,<s%> <S%H738>lions<s%> upon him that <S%H6413>escapeth<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and upon the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H127>land.<s%>
